docs.snippet: Public-sector corruption is still a major problem around the world but more countries are improving than worsening and the United States and United Kingdom have reached their best rankings ever, an anti-corruption watchdog said Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Public-sector corruption is still a major problem around the world but more countries are improving than worsening and the United States and United Kingdom have reached their best rankings ever, an anti-corruption watchdog said Wednesday.

headline.main: Report: Denmark Is Least Corrupt; Somalia, N.Korea the Most

docs.snippet: Two cameras owned by the Canadian company UrtheCast are available for surveillance jobs from their low-earth orbit on the International Space Station....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two cameras owned by the Canadian company UrtheCast are available for surveillance jobs from their low-earth orbit on the International Space Station.
docs.abstract: Private company UrtheCast operates two advanced cameras on Russian side of International Space Station that are capable of space-based surveillance of Earth; company has proposed that technology be used by European Union to help police national borders.

headline.main: A Space Station, With Surveillance Cameras for Hire
headline.print_headline: Eyes in the Sky, for Hire

docs.snippet: The "Doomsday Clock" by the Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists measures the likelihood of a global cataclysm by reflecting how vulnerable the world is to catastrophe from nuclear weapons, climate change and new technologies. Midnight represents the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The "Doomsday Clock" by the Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists measures the likelihood of a global cataclysm by reflecting how vulnerable the world is to catastrophe from nuclear weapons, climate change and new technologies. Midnight represents the apocalypse. Here are some key dates in the clock's nearly 70-year history:

docs.snippet: The Iran nuclear deal and movement on climate change prompted the scientists who maintain the Doomsday Clock, a symbolic countdown to global catastrophe, to keep it unchanged on Tuesday at three minutes to midnight....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Iran nuclear deal and movement on climate change prompted the scientists who maintain the Doomsday Clock, a symbolic countdown to global catastrophe, to keep it unchanged on Tuesday at three minutes to midnight.

headline.main: Doomsday Clock Stays Unchanged at Three Minutes to Midnight
headline.print_headline: Doomsday Clock Stays Unchanged at Three Minutes to Midnight

docs.snippet: Airbus orders, likely to be partly financed with loans from European export-credit agencies, could be announced as early as this week, an official said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Airbus orders, likely to be partly financed with loans from European export-credit agencies, could be announced as early as this week, an official said.
docs.abstract: Airbus says it is in discussions with Iran over sale of dozens of new commercial aircraft, among first of new international business agreements for country since it agreed to nuclear deal; companies in United States express caution in dealing with Iran.

headline.main: Iran’s Sanctions Lift, and the West Goes to Talk Business
headline.print_headline: Now the West Talks Business With Iranians
